channel.title: Go on Alex Freestone | Getting Stuff Wrong, Writing About It

item.title: My experience getting started with Hugo
item.description: It looks like all tech blogs need to start with posts about how the blog was built. So here goes. If you haven’t seen the footer I decided to go with Hugo to create my blog, it seemed fairly easy and created a static site that I can run on github pages or AWS S3. A recurring theme on this blog will probably be how terrible I am as a developer so this is really a must have feature.
